title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: Knowledge Management Project-Based Approach for Building an Organizational Learning Culture

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and organizational systems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the current state of an organization’s learning culture and derive improvement points using diagnostic tools.
Through project-based learning, learners can design and implement knowledge-sharing systems (shared documents, mentoring systems, etc.).
Learners can measure the outcomes of learning culture improvement activities through formative assessments and incorporate feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
